entry.title: Luau Conditioner Bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dirty Bee
Type: Bath & Body
Price: 9.99 - 30.99 (4 variants)

Luau Conditioner Bar

LUAU - Tropical fruits and floral blend

Our Conditioner bars are super concentrated and contain only luxurious, salon quality ingredients. Convenient, compact, and environmentally friendly, each bar will easily outlast three medium sized bottles of traditional conditioner! 

Benefits Include:

  • Luxurious Formula
  • No Large Plastic Bottle 
  • Perfect for Traveling (FDA Compliant) & Camping 
  • Animal Cruelty Free
  • pH Balanced 
  • Vegan Friendly 
  • Long Lasting 
  • Mother Nature Approved 
  • Suitable For ALL Hair Types 
  • Ensures Beautiful, Soft, & Shiny Hair

Directions: Rub directly on hair or between hands and apply.  Wait 2-3 minutes before rinsing.  

Ingredients: Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cocoa Butter, Cetyl Alcohol, Coconut Oil, Glycerine USP, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Wheat Germ Oil, Jojoba Oil, Fragrance/EO, Color (May contain: Charcoal Powder, Red#40 Lake, Brown Oxide, Chromium Hydroxide Green, Yellow #5 Lake, Yellow #6 Lake, Green #8, Green #5, Red #33, Violet #2, Genitian Violet)

Ingredients: Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cocoa Butter, Cetyl Alcohol, Coconut Oil, Glycerine USP, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Wheat Germ Oil, Jojoba Oil, Fragrance/EO, Color (May contain: Charcoal Powder, Red#40 Lake, Brown Oxide, Chromium Hydroxide Green, Yellow #5 Lake, Yellow #6 Lake, Green #8, Green #5, Red #33, Violet #2, Genitian Violet)

entry.title: Charcoal Conditioner Bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dirty Bee
Type: Bath & Body
Price: 9.99 - 30.99 (4 variants)

Charcoal Conditioner Bar

Charcoal: Unisex blend of woodsy scent and Moroccan mud musk

Our Charcoal Conditioner bar is super concentrated and contains only luxurious, salon quality ingredients.  Convenient, compact, and environmentally friendly, each bar will easily outlast three medium sized bottles of traditional conditioner! 

Benefits Include:

  • Luxurious Formula
  • No Large Plastic Bottle 
  • Perfect for Traveling (FDA Compliant) & Camping 
  • Animal Cruelty Free
  • pH Balanced 
  • Vegan Friendly 
  • Long Lasting 
  • Mother Nature Approved 
  • Suitable for ALL Hair Types 
  • Ensures Beautiful, Soft, & Shiny Hair

Directions: Rub directly on hair or between hands and apply.  Wait 2-3 minutes before rinsing.  

Ingredients: Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cocoa Butter, Cetyl Alcohol, Coconut Oil, Glycerine USP, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Wheat Germ Oil, Jojoba Oil, Fragrance/EO, Charcoal Powder
